sentences.sentence: But after living with Mahatma Gandhi in his ashram in the mid-1940s, something had happened to him.
sentences.translation: 但是1940年代中期与马哈塔马•甘地(Mahatama Gandhi)在他的修炼道场一起生活过之后，某些事情在他身上发生了。
